# GitHub Repository Settings

Use these settings for your GitHub repository to improve discoverability and presentation.

## Repository Description

```
Machine learning system for predicting housing prices in Izmir, Turkey with luxury scoring algorithm
```

## Topics (Tags)

Add these topics to your repository:

- `machine-learning`
- `python`
- `streamlit`
- `scikit-learn`
- `real-estate`
- `price-prediction`
- `data-science`
- `gradient-boosting`
- `housing-market`
- `turkey`
- `data-analysis`
- `predictive-modeling`

## How to Add

1. Go to your repository: https://github.com/EdaNurBinici/izmir-housing-price-ml
2. Click the ⚙️ (Settings) gear icon next to "About" on the right sidebar
3. Add the description in the "Description" field
4. Add topics in the "Topics" field (comma-separated)
5. Click "Save changes"

## Optional: Social Preview Image

Consider adding a social preview image (1280x640px) showing:
- Project logo or screenshot
- Key features
- Technology stack

Upload at: Settings → General → Social preview → Upload an image
